data.name: Steel Division 2 - Pre-order Pack
data.detailed_description:
Pre-order Steel Division 2 now and get exclusive bonuses at the game’s release! This is a limited-time offer, and won’t be available after release! Check out the gorgeous bonuses:

  • Beta Access
  • 2 Exclusive Aces
  • 2 Exclusive Camos
  • 2 Exclusive Wallpapers

The most famous Aces of Bagration

Field iconic World War 2 Aces on the battlefield, learn about their incredible story and lead them to victory! Exclusively available for pre-order, these cosmetic models are:


  • Ivan Nikitovich Kozhedub with his La-7 fighter aircraft, the "Ace of the Aces", holding the record for the highest number of confirmed air combat victories of any Soviet or Allied pilot
  • Ludwig Neigl and his Nashorn tank destroyer

The Pre-Order Pack also contains exclusive camos to customize your favorite units on the battlefield, and fantastic wallpapers specially made for your desktop!

Take part in a massive Beta

Be one of the first to test the game during the huge Beta starting weeks before the official release date. Earn your stripes, send us your feedback and join the ever-growing Steel Division 2 community!


Official Beta schedule will be announced soon, so stay tuned!

Play before anyone else with the Deluxe Editions

Pre-Order one of the Deluxe Editions (Commander Deluxe Edition, General Deluxe Edition, Total Conflict Edition) to get an 48-hours early access to the game before release!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
